attributes.action: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: RECOGNISING that the United Kingdom is Great Britain; England, Wales, & Scotland; and Northern Ireland, and that together each part is a diverse product of the sum that makes the UK special and unique throughout the world  we the undersigned reaffirm our identity as of being British Citizens and call on all the government to positively promote the United Kingdom amongst her peoples by a new covenant or appropriate measure that makes us all proud to British.
